author: Elizabeth Bifrost
comment: Wonderful app! My family and I are terrible at flipping coins, so we use this app for board and card games. True to its name, it really is simple and truly random. I made some Pokemon themed coins to customize it for our game. Thank you, this app truly is a gem.

author: Brotherhood Knight
comment: To all the people that leaves off a star just because they didn't have a certain coin or design....you're retarded. It's a coin FLIP app. Not a feelings app

author: Daniel Ralph
comment: I tried other coin flip apps but this is by far the best one. Also it is very easy to use.
title: Love it

author: Mariecel Caracar
comment: I give 5star although i dont know about these game😂..did any benefit you can get of these game😉

author: Ming Leung
comment: Ad free and no permissions required not like so many other apps out there. Simple, affective and it works (HTC M8). Thanks.

author: Charls Trickel
comment: Custom coins don't work on wear

reply.author: Richard Banasiak
reply.content: Hey Charls. If you choose a custom coin on the phone app, it should resize and transfer to the wear app.  It might take up to 30 seconds, though, depending on the quality of the Bluetooth connection. What model watch are you using? I'll try to reproduce your issue. Thanks!

author: Matthew Armstrong
comment: Would be 6* if you did a UK coin pack... I just want a 2p coins to flip!
title: Best there is

author: DOUG ROBINSON
comment: Great past time game!

author: Tibeau S
comment: 10/10 would use again!

author: Ilja Noordermeer
comment: Great app. I use it to teach probability to my tutoring students.

author: Brian Klein
comment: The Super Mario reference is classic. 5 stars for that alone

author: Just MilkingIt
comment: Tell you what you stink

author: Grey Mealer
comment: Gets the job done.

reply.author: Richard Banasiak
reply.content: It's as fair as the Android runtime's RNG. Here's the source: https://github.com/banasiak/CoinFlip/blob/master/dependencies/lib/src/main/java/com/banasiak/coinflip/lib/Coin.java

comment: So far so good.

comment: It's too Mario for me, I have a bad Nintendo flashback. I can see you did a lot of work here though, so I gave it a try.
title: Too Mario!

author: abdulla farook
comment: Hard to believe that a devoloper is giving a decent but genuine looking app free without any adds... it's a good app!!
title: A great utility....

author: Stephen Gerathy
comment: Just what I was after.  Simple and easy to use. Only very minor issue is that the App icon is pretty boring.
title: A Good App...

author: Brett Graber
comment: Very easy to use & fun to play with even if you don't buy the coin packs.
title: Real good.

author: George Johnson
comment: I use the Wear version when I referee soccer. The players, young and old, all comment on how cool it is.
title: People love it

author: Galactic Dan
comment: Does exactly what I need, no permissions needed, no ads, and the diagnostic tool and stat tracking are neato bonuses.

author: TYBH
comment: It does its job
title: Good

comment: Great app! Just please add the British penny as a selectable coin

comment: I would give 5 stars if there was a Canadian coin option. ;)

comment: Flip it like a pro

comment: Excellent app. Kindly change app icon to a bright and attractive one.

comment: Great and easy for settling bets
title: Great!

comment: No ads? No permissions? Yay!
title: Cool

author: Aubri Campbell
comment: Best app ever
title: Love it

author: Jonathan Mo
comment: Indeed simple and useful

author: Aaron V
comment: Why does it all of a sudden need to keep my phone awake? Not updating again. If update becomes necessary, will uninstall. Not cool, since I paid for the expansion pack. Update: Sorry to hear about the new package deal permissions. Will continue to update.

reply.author: Richard Banasiak
reply.content: Hi Aaron. Here's the scoop on permissions. This app only requires one - vibrate. However, starting with apps compiled for Android 6.0, Google Play is lumping all of the "safe" permissions into a general category called "Other". The new model is a clusterf&#$ right now. :( Shoot me an email and we can discuss further or I can give you a refund.

title: Hey...

author: James Quinn
comment: This is a huge amount of fun. It baffles me to see that people get closed-source, ad-laden programs where clean, elegant, open-source alternatives exist. This gentleman obviously does something creative with computers for a living. It reminds me of the time my roommate's brother-in-law fixed our boom-box. He was an electrical engineer at one of  the national nuclear labs, and the result was consequently way better than it needed to be.  Thanks for a fun (and suspiciously perfect) app!  :)
title: OMFG

author: Brenden Keene
comment: Finally a coin flip app with that isn't ugly or packed with ads and issues. Wear support is an extra bonus. Wish it had a more realistic flip animation but hey... still great.
title: Good quality

author: Justin H
comment: By far the greatest flipping app on the play store. One of the only reasons I bought an Android! 6/5 stars.
title: Un Flipping Believable

author: T. G.
comment: GREAT JOB AGAIN FOR NO UNNECESSARY APP PERMISSION FOR ALL!!)
title: Love not having to give u access to see everything on my phone.  GREAT JOB

author: Ruthanne Reid
comment: No permissions, no weirdness, no annoying ads. This is exactly what I was looking for.
title: Perfect

author: Devin Loder
comment: Basically perfect. Now it just needs to always pick the flip that's best for me.
